scripts.description: Get all types of Quranic Scripts. For Example- Uthmani Script , Indo-pak Script etc.

uthmani v20.description: Uthmani Script is the most standardized Qura'nic Script in traditional form, written in Uthmani Hafs Qirat style.
Uthmani Script is the most standardized Qura'nic Script in traditional form, written in Uthmani Hafs Qirat style.

Indo-Pak v9.6.description: Indo-Pak Madinah Script is same as the one published by KFGQPC in Madinah.
Indo-Pak Madinah Text is same as the one published by KFGQPC in Madinah.
Indo-Pak Hanafi version is based on Hanafi School of Thought, published in India and Pakistan regions. Main difference is in Ayah numbering of Surah Al Fatiha.
Indo-Pak Hanafi version is based on Hanafi School of Thought, published in India and Pakistan regions. Main difference is in Ayah numbering of Surah Al Fatiha.

Nastaleeq v10.description: Nastaleeq Script is same as the Indo-Pak script but the font style is like Uthmani
Nastaleeq Script is same as the Indo-Pak script but the font style is like Uthmani.

fonts.description: Get all the highly optimized Quranic Fonts initial for development.

author: KFGQPC
Uthmani Font v20.description: Uthmani Font is a very highly optimized Font for Uthmani Quranic Script.

author: Al Qalam
Gandhara
KFGQPC
Ayman Siddiqui
Indo-Pak Font v4.2.1.description: This font is created and optimized for the Indo-Pak Quran script but it doesn't contain Waqf - Lazim margin indicator.

author: Al Qalam
Gandhara
KFGQPC
Ayman Siddiqui
Indo-Pak Font v4.2.1.description: This font is created and optimized for the Indo-Pak Quran script and contains Waqf - Lazim margin indicator.

author: KFGQPC
Nastaleeq Font v10.description: This font is created and optimized for the Nastaleeq Quran script.

author: KFGQPC
Surah Names Font.description: This is an optimized font responsible for rendering Surah Names in calligraphic style.

reciters.description: Get majority of the Quran reciters audio and generated links JSON files

Minshawy.description: The Mistakes are only in his Mujawwad Recitation and are not in the Murattal Recitation.

translations.description: Get most of the available Qur'an Audio Translations in different languages.

Sahih_International.description: This is the English Translation of the Qur'an.

Farhat_Hashmi.description: This is the Word by Word Arabic Quran + Urdu Translation. Which means the translator will read the arabic word first and then will tell you its translation in urdu.

Shamshad_Ali_Khan.description: This is the Urdu Translation of the Qur'an.

Makarem.description: This is the Persian Translation of the Qur'an by Naser Makarem Shirazi.

Besim_Korkut.description: This is the Bosnian Translation of the Qur'an by Besim Korkut.

Fooladvand.description: This is the Persian  Translation of the Qur'an by Fooladvand.

Balayev.description: This is the AzerBaijani Translation of the Qur'an by Balayev.

Sahih_International_with_recitation.description: The Mistakes are only in the Arabic Quran Recitation and not in the English Quran Translation.

database.description: Get full hadith Database file and extract the data in any format you want.

Hadith Database.description: This is the Hadith Database Sql file from sunnah.com containing 16 books of hadiths. This database contains Arabic hadiths with only English translations.
